pages.text: $(li)The Ambergris can be used as a fuel to burn 64 items in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/smoker)Smoker$(/l), $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/blast_furnace)Blast $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l)$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:utility/environmental/kiln)Kiln$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be obtained trading with a $(l:patchouli:villagers/fisherman)Fisherman$(/l) by your $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l).

$(li)This item can be obtained pushing back into the water a $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/cachalot_whale)Cachalot Whale$(/l) that is out of the water during a thunderstorm.$(br)$(li)This item can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/echolocator)Echolocator$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l) too.
